description:
â€œThis class was amazing. Rob is a tremendous teacher and the gems I walked away with far outweighed the monetary cost. You must check this out!"

- Scott Britton, Founder, Life-Long Learner

"...a little update, thanks to you I am only paying about $100 a month for rent and paying off my credit cards!!"
- Sabrina Fairclough, Photographer

"Rob doesn't waste time and has tons of knowledge."
- Jeff Ramos, Polygon

What is the biggest obstacle you face in pursuing your dreams here in New York City? For thousands of New Yorkers the answer is simple: the rent. I struggled for ten years with this issue - until finally I solved it - and began the rent-free life I've been enjoying for the last four years (yes, that's my home in the photo above). In this revolutionary online course you'll learn how to:

  • Save money painlessly
  • Avoid the biggest mistakes made by NYC home-buyers
  • Buy the very best NYC home - at the lowest possible price - and get paid to live in it!

The course contains 20+ in-depth video lessons (3-10 minutes a piece), and everything I learned over those ten years, plus direct access to me through the discussion forums and even free one-on-one consultation. You'll learn powerful techniques that will dramatically improve your financial and home life, guaranteed. By the end of the course you will have a realistic and achievable step-by-step plan that flips the script on the New York real estate market and puts you in control of your home and your finances.

Think of me as your rent-free lifestyle coach. I'll be here to answer your questions as you move through the modules and put your rent-free plan into action. Freed from the burden of ever-rising rents, what could you do? What could you be? Lets find out!
title: Life Hack: How to Live Rent-Free in NYC
